metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000546 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Triplea version <= 1.9.0.0.10291 contains a XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in Importing game data that can result in Possible information disclosure, server-side request forgery, or remote code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable via Specially crafted game data file (XML).

criterions.comment: triplea package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
